query:
UPDATE requests
            SET
                state = 'pending',
                daemon_id = NULL,
                claimed_at = NULL,
                started_at = NULL
            WHERE id IN (
                SELECT id FROM requests
                WHERE
                    (state = 'claimed' AND claimed_at < NOW() - ($1 || ' milliseconds')::INTERVAL)
                    OR
                    (state = 'processing' AND started_at < NOW() - ($2 || ' milliseconds')::INTERVAL)
                LIMIT $3
            )
